ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 30
ygData.msgSnippet: I m trying desperately to find a pot sketch.  Any suggestions? ... From: Omega8  To:  Sent: Sunday, July 18,
ygData.messageBody:
I'm trying desperately to find a pot sketch. Any suggestions?


----- Original Message -----
From: Omega8 <omega8@...>
To: <EQ_Potters@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, July 18, 1999 7:20 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Potters] Digest Number 30


> From: "Omega8" <omega8@...>
>
>
> That silk evening shirt is also a quest item, Just so's you kow :)
>
> >On the subject of cha raising items, in Qeynos, on the plaza by the
docks,
> >there
> >is a woman npc under an awning (Iala something?) who sells a "Fine Silk
> >Evening
> >Shirt" Char + 5. Pretty cheap for the benefit as well. Since, if your
> >doing pottery
> >or another trade skill, your probably not fighting, swapping that for
your
> >armor
> >before buying or selling may be worth it.
> >
> >
> >
